sourcesContent:
import {React,useState} from 'react' import * as yup from 'yup' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import {yupResolver} from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' import './Registration.css' const schema = yup.object().shape({ username:yup.string().required(), email:yup.string().email().required(), password:yup.string().min(4).max(15).required(), age:yup.string().required(), cPassword:yup.string().oneOf([yup.ref("password"),null]).required() }) const RegistrationForm = () => { const [useInfo, setUserInfo] = useState() const {register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}} = useForm({ resolver:yupResolver(schema) }) const onSubmit =(data)=>{ console.log(data) setUserInfo(data) } return (

Registration Form

{JSON.stringify(user)}

{errors.username?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

{errors.age?.message}

{errors.password?.message}

{errors.cPassword && "Passwords do not Match"}

) } export default RegistrationForm
